The unique ID of the zone.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

result.description: A list of rulesets. The returned information will not include the rules in each ruleset.

PATCH /zones/{zone_id}/rulesets/{ruleset.description: Updates an existing rule in a zone ruleset.

schema.description: The unique ID of the rule.
The unique ID of the ruleset.
The unique ID of the zone.

position.description: An object configuring where the rule will be placed.

before.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule before. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the top.

after.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule after. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the bottom.

index.description: An index at which to place the rule, where index 1 is the first rule.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

200.description: Update a zone ruleset rule response.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Update a zone ruleset rule failure response.

POST /zones/{zone_id}/rulesets.description: Creates a ruleset at the zone level.

schema.description: The unique ID of the zone.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Create a zone ruleset failure response.

POST /zones/{zone_id}/rulesets/{ruleset_.description: Adds a new rule to a zone ruleset. The rule will be added to the end of the existing list of rules in the ruleset by default.

schema.description: The unique ID of the ruleset.
The unique ID of the zone.

position.description: An object configuring where the rule will be placed.

before.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule before. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the top.

after.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule after. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the bottom.

index.description: An index at which to place the rule, where index 1 is the first rule.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

200.description: Create a zone ruleset rule response.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Create a zone ruleset rule failure response.
